text:
Sec 13(d), first part, exempts from
the provisions of Secs 6, 7, and 12 “any employee engaged in the delivery of
newspapers to the consumer”. The term newspaper is considered as having the
same meaning under Sec 13(d) as under Sec 13(a)(8).
html: Sec 13(d), first part, exempts from the provisions of Secs 6, 7, and 12 “any employee engaged in the delivery of newspapers to the consumer”. The term newspaper is considered as having the same meaning under Sec 13(d) as under Sec 13(a)(8).
